exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
 
2. Lower your body to the ground by bending your elbows.
 
3. Push your body back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description:
1. Stand with feet together and arms at your sides.
 
2. Jump while spreading your legs wider than shoulder-width and raising your arms overhead.
 
3. Return to the starting position by jumping your legs together and lowering your arms.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description:
1. Start in a forearm plank position.
 
2. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
 
3. Engage your core and hold the position without letting your hips sag.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description:
1. Sit on a chair with one leg extended and the other leg bent.
 
2. Reach toward the toes of the extended leg while keeping your back straight.
 
3. Hold for 20-30 seconds, then switch legs.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell in front of you.
 
2. Bend at your hips and knees, grabbing the barbell with both hands.
 
3. Straighten your back and hips to lift the barbell.
 
4. Lower the barbell back to the ground by bending your hips and knees.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description:
1. Stand with a dumbbell in each hand, arms at your sides.
 
2. Curl the weights toward your shoulders, keeping your elbows stationary.
 
3. Lower the weights back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description:
1. Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
 
2. Push back up to the starting position.
 
3. Repeat on the other leg.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description:
1. Lie on a bench with a barbell or dumbbells in each hand.
 
2. Lower the weight to your chest, keeping your elbows at about a 45-degree angle.
 
3. Push the weight back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
 
2. Lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
 
3. Keep your chest lifted and your knees behind your toes.
 
4. Return to the standing position.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description:
1. Stand tall, then squat down and place your hands on the floor.
 
2. Jump your feet back into a plank position.
 
3. Do a push-up, then jump your feet back toward your hands.
 
4. Jump up to a standing position.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description:
1. Start in a plank position with your arms straight.
 
2. Alternate bringing each knee toward your chest at a quick pace.
 
3. Continue alternating legs while maintaining a plank position.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description:
1. Stand tall with your arms at your sides.
 
2. Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible.
 
3. Keep your arms pumping as you run.

exercises.name: Cobra Pose
exercises.description:
1. Lie on your stomach with your legs extended.
 
2. Place your hands under your shoulders, elbows bent.
 
3. Push your upper body off the ground, extending your arms as you lift your chest and head.

exercises.name: Bridge Pose
exercises.description:
1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
 
2. Lift your hips off the ground, squeezing your glutes and lower back.
 
3. Keep your arms at your sides for support.

exercises.name: Boat Pose
exercises.description:
1. Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.

2. Lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.

3. Balance on your sit bones, keeping your torso upright.

4. Extend your arms straight forward at shoulder height.

5. Hold the position and maintain balance.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.description:
1. Kneel on your right knee, with your left foot placed in front, forming a 90-degree angle.

2. Keep your back straight and your torso upright.

3. Push your hips forward to feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.

4. Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then switch sides.

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.description:
1. Grab the pull-up bar with palms facing away from you, hands shoulder-width apart.

2. Hang with your arms fully extended and your feet off the ground.

3. Pull your body upward until your chin is above the bar.

4. Slowly lower your body back to the starting position.

5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description:
1. Hold the jump rope handles with both hands, elbows bent slightly.

2. Swing the rope over your head and jump as it swings under your feet.

3. Aim for quick, consistent jumps.

4. Maintain a steady pace for the desired duration.

5. Control your breathing and keep your core engaged.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description:
1. Stand in front of a box or platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.

2. Bend your knees slightly and swing your arms to prepare for the jump.

3. Jump onto the box or platform, landing softly with knees bent.

4. Step back down or jump back down to the starting position.

5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description:
1. Sit on the floor with your feet together and knees bent outward.

2. Gently press your knees towards the floor with your elbows.

3. Hold the position for the desired duration while keeping your back straight.

4. Relax and breathe deeply during the stretch.

exercises.name: Standing Side Stretch
exercises.description:
1. Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.

2. Reach your right arm up towards the ceiling.

3. Gently lean your body to the left side to stretch the right side of your torso.

4. Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then return to the starting position.

5. Repeat the stretch on the other side.
